import addProduct from "../utils/addProduct" export default function Cadastrar() { function submit(e) { e.preventDefault() const codField = document.querySelector('#codeInput').value const descriptionField = document.querySelector('#descriptionInput').value const sizeField = document.querySelector('#sizeInput').value addProduct(codField, descriptionField, sizeField) } const [data, setData] = useState({ codeInput: '', descriptionInput: '', sizeInput: '' }) function handle(e) { const newData = {...data} newData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newData) } return ( <>
await submit(e)}>

Cadastrar Produto

handle(e)} type="number" id="codeInput"/> handle(e)} type="text" id="descriptionInput"/> handle(e)} type="text" id="sizeInput"/>
) }
